rules.name: Extract Percentages
rules.description: Matches percentage values in the format of digits followed by a '%' symbol.

rules.name: Extract Monetary Values with Comma and Decimal Format
rules.description: Matches monetary values, formatted with commas and decimals, optionally followed by a currency unit.

rules.name: Capture Currency Considerations
rules.description: Matches standalone currencies or currency pairs.

rules.name: Handle Numeric Values (General)
rules.description: Matches generic numeric values that are not specifically monetary but may be relevant.

rules.name: Extract Detailed Monetary Patterns
rules.description: Python function to extract monetary values and percentages.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['context']
    percentage_pattern = re.compile(r'\b\d{1,3}(?:[.,]\d{1,2})? %\b')
    monetary_pattern = re.compile(r'\b\d{1,3}(?:[.,]\d{3})*(?:[.,]\d{2})? \w*\b')
    for match in percentage_pattern.finditer(text):
        spans.append({'text': match.group(), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    for match in monetary_pattern.finditer(text):
        spans.append({'text': match.group(), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Extract Specific Financial Terms
rules.description: Matches specific terms tied to monetary values.
